name: Spanish Arabic Translator
description: This free app is able to translate words and text from Spanish to Arabic, and from Arabic to Spanish. Best app for easy and fast translations, which can be used like a dictionary. If you are a student, tourist or traveler , it will helps you to learn the language!   This translator contains the following features: - Translate words and sentences - Translate from clipboard - Simple and user-friendly interface - Instant search - Instant start  Traductor gratuito del espaol al rabe y del rabe al espaol.          .
